title: Article Schema
description: The Article Archetype - Essential properties that define an article

_id.description: Unique identifier for this archetype record

_sid.description: Unique short identifier for this archetype record

servant_id.description: The servant to whom this record belongs

created.description: Date and time this archetype record was created in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

updated.description: Date and time this archetype record was updated in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

author.description: The Contact Archetype Record ID of the person who authored this post

publish_date.description: Date and time of publication in ISO 8601 date standard e.g. YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD

html.description: Content of the blog post in html format

plaintext.description: Content of the blog post in plain text format

category.description: A Tag Archetype record to use as this record's category

subcategory.description: A Tag Archetype record to use as this record's subcategory

tags.description: Array of Tag Archetypes that are used to help categorize this Archetype record
